debug:
b2 serialization filesystem system toolset=msvc-14.0 variant=debug threading=multi link=static runtime-link=static define="_HAS_ITERATOR_DEBUGGING=0"

release:
b2 serialization filesystem system toolset=msvc-14.0 variant=release threading=multi link=static runtime-link=static define="_HAS_ITERATOR_DEBUGGING=0"

release x64:
b2 serialization filesystem system toolset=msvc-14.0 variant=release threading=multi link=static runtime-link=static address-model=64 define="_HAS_ITERATOR_DEBUGGING=0"
